item.description:
This event is organized by the DCR.

Sunday, March 30 1 pm
CCC History Hike
Meet at Chickatawbut Overlook on Chickatawbut Road in Quincy.
Two thousand eight marks the 75th anniversary of the creation of the Civilian Conservation Corps. Join us as we celebrate the contributions of the CCC in the Blue Hills. We?ll admire Chickatawbut Overlook, a CCC project from the 1930?s, then stretch our legs on a 2.5 mile hike to the site of the former CCC Camp. 1.5 hours

Take Rte 93 to exit 5 and get on rte 28 North. Take a left at the first intersection -Chickatawbut Rd.
item.name: CCC History Hike in Quincy
